Omada is a fast-growing global cybersecurity software company with locations across the world and headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark. We are a Gartner Magic Quadrant leader in Identity Governance and Administration with one of the most advanced SaaS platforms in the industry. Our vision is to ‚Äúsecure the world‚Äôs identities.‚Äù Omada‚Äôs growth is backed by some of the best private equity funds in the world who are investing in technology and looking to expand Omada‚Äôs overall CTPO organization.  We are looking for a skilled Test Automation Developer to join our scrum team where you get to develop tests scenarios and test scripts for new features of our IT security product.  Our office in Alicante is providing attractive working conditions for our employees and we are ready for the many new colleagues that we will be hiring in the coming months. You will be working closely together with our developers in Poland and Denmark via fully integrated scrum teams and get a high amount of responsibility in the further development of our product. In your role as Test Automation Developer, you will: üü¢Extend and improve the existing UI‚ÄØand inthe the tegration test framework and introduce, new ones if necessary.‚ÄØ üü¢Analyze documentation, cooperate with scrum team to understand business requirements‚ÄØand create testable stories and requirements.  üü¢Estimate time required for performing test activities. üü¢Create test scenarios and test cases with a focus on automation. üü¢Record defects using bug tracking software, investigate and analyze each problem, track status of defect and verify its resolution during the testing life cycle. üü¢Execute on automated tests, investigate, and analyze results.  üü¢Perform peer code reviews and do peer programming sessions.  üü¢Participate in all SCRUM ceremonies, e.g., the sprint planning session where plans are made with the entire team and the PO, and the end of sprint demonstrations, where the latest innovations are shared with the larger team.  üü¢Be responsible for the quality, working closely together with scrum team members securing a high quality when we release new features.  You‚ÄØhave:‚ÄØ üî∑You have at least 3 - 5 years of experience with test automation.  üî∑You have a good eye for details, and you are ambitious and passionate about test and technologies.‚ÄØ üî∑You can collaborate with developers to understand how the development changes affect ongoing automation efforts.‚ÄØ üî∑Higher IT education such as graduate or master üî∑Experience with the following:   C# and .NET   üî∑Experience with Selenium WebDriver or similar UI action simulation tools‚ÄØ üî∑Knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server üî∑Hands on experience with Test automation and implementation of testing tools‚ÄØ‚ÄØ üî∑Experience with Microsoft Test Manager, Azure DevOps‚ÄØ üî∑Advanced experience with test runners like‚ÄØNUnit,‚ÄØxUnit,‚ÄØMSTest‚ÄØor similar‚ÄØ We Offer: Omada is an incredible place to work and develop your career and technical skills. We have a strong focus on our people and our core values including:  Teamwork,  Being Ambitious, Always Delivering Value, Constant Care.  These values are also reflected in the relationship with our employees and the way we live every day.  We want our employees to be able to have a great career at Omada and offer a modern flexible working model where they will be able to work more days remotely. We anticipate 2 days of work from the office in Alicante per week.  We also provide great benefits and rewards that you would expect from a market leading global software company.Some of the Benefits we offer: üîπTraining budget  üîπAccess to LinkedIn LearningüîπThe opportunity to work with passionate, competent people, experts within their fieldüîπInformal and agile organization with a flat structure

About Us:Flawless is a pioneering force at the forefront of Web 3.0 innovation, shaping the digital landscape with a team of over 25 experienced engineers. We specialize in crafting bespoke Web 3.0 solutions for enterprises of all sizes, leveraging the latest advancements in the field to create standout products and assets. With a remarkable track record, including over 200 Smart Contracts developed, 400 Smart Contract Audits conducted, 100 Dapps launched, and 10 NFT & GameFi Platforms successfully deployed, we are committed to excellence and innovation.Key Responsibilities:As an Ethereum Web3 Developer at Flawless, you will play a pivotal role in driving the development and deployment of cutting-edge blockchain solutions. Your responsibilities will include:Smart Contract Development: Design, implement, and deploy robust and secure smart contracts tailored to client needs, ensuring adherence to best practices and industry standards.Dapp Development: Lead the creation of decentralized applications (Dapps), employing your expertise to deliver seamless and user-friendly interfaces on the Ethereum blockchain.Interoperability: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure interoperability of our solutions across various blockchain networks, contributing to the evolution of Web 3.0.Security Audits: Conduct thorough smart contract audits to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities, ensuring the reliability and safety of our blockchain solutions.Innovation: Stay at the forefront of Ethereum and Web 3.0 developments, bringing innovative ideas to the table and implementing cutting-edge technologies in our projects.Qualifications:Proven experience in Ethereum and Web 3.0 development, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful projects.Expertise in Solidity, Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), and understanding of blockchain architecture.Familiarity with decentralized application design principles and user experience considerations.Experience in conducting security audits for smart contracts.Skills:Solid proficiency in Solidity and smart contract development.Strong understanding of Ethereum, Web 3.0, and blockchain technologies.Excellent problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.Effective communication and collaboration within a dynamic, innovative team environment.Values:Innovation through cutting-edge technologies.Commitment to quality, reliability, honesty, and accountability.Dedication to continuous learning and delivery of unparalleled customer experiences.Embrace humility through a flat hierarchy.Mission:Join us in promoting the global adoption of blockchain technologies and digital currencies, shaping the future of the internet with an emphasis on digital identity, assets, interoperability, and stable digital payment methods.Vision:Be part of our journey to become one of the Top 10 blockchain companies globally. Lead by example as we accelerate and promote the mass adoption of Web 3.0. Become the go-to partner for the world¬¥s best tech-based companies through best-in-class software engineering and strategic technological management.If you¬¥re passionate about revolutionizing the digital landscape and have the skills to drive Web 3.0 innovation, join Flawless in building the future of blockchain technology.Flawless is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage candidates of all backgrounds to apply.

and Web 3.0 developments, bringing innovative ideas to the table and implementing cutting-edge technologies in our projects.Qualifications:Proven experience in Ethereum and Web 3.0 development, with a experiences.Embrace humility through a flat hierarchy.Mission:Join us in promoting the global adoption of blockchain technologies and digital currencies, shaping the future of the internet with an emphasis on digital identity, assets, interoperability, and stable digital payment methods.Vision:Be part of our journey to become one of the Top 10 blockchain companies globally. Lead by example as we accelerate and promote the mass adoption of Web 3.0. Become the go-to partner for the world¬¥s best tech-based companies through best-in-class software engineering and strategic technological management.If you¬¥re passionate about revolutionizing the digital landscape and have the skills to drive Web 3.0 innovation, join Flawless in building the future of blockchain technology.Flawless is an equal opportunity employer. We are currently recruiting for a Chief Information Security Officer (CISO), reporting to the Chief Technology Officer, to be responsible for ensuring the security, privacy, and compliance of Tunstall‚Äôs operations on a global scale.This role could work on a hybrid basis from any of our main hubs, Manchester city centre, Malmo, or Madrid.What will you be doing in this role? As our CISO, you will safeguard the company‚Äôs internal infrastructure, but also influence and contribute to the security and resilience of our operations, assets, and reputation. This role is not just the shaping of strategy but the execution and be hands-on delivery of this strategy. You will help shape and build a comprehensive cyber security and information security strategy that aligns with business objectives and play a pivotal role in ensuring the security of our SaaS products.The identification, assessment, and prioritisation of security risks associated with both internal and external factors and ensuring the compliance with all relevant laws and regulations related to security, including GDPR (and other relevant data protection regulations), are vital to the success of this role.You will lead, inspire, and mentor the security and compliance teams globally, fostering a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence, as well as promoting security awareness throughout Tunstall, upskilling, and educating colleagues as required.We are a global business, and our business language is English, so you must be fluent in English to be considered for this role.The Ideal candidate:To be successful in this role you will have proven experience in cyber and information security, in a leadership role. You will have a strong knowledge of software as a service (SaaS) products and on-premise technical solutions, with demonstrable experience of delivering security solutions for SaaS products. You will be able to demonstrate success in shaping, building, executing, and implementing a comprehensive cyber security and information security strategy. This role does require someone with in-depth technical cyber security and information security knowledge.You will have excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, able to convey and ensure an understanding of complex messages. In addition, you will be a proven and collaborative leader, with a strong teamwork ethic, a can-do attitude, happy to be both strategic and hands on, and used to working in a fast-moving organisation, able to create structure and clarity from ambiguity. Experience with a hardware provider / manufacturer as well would be highly desirable.What we offer:‚Ä¢ Hybrid Working,‚Ä¢ Competitive salary + potential bonus,‚Ä¢ Car allowance,‚Ä¢ A warm and welcoming team environment.Some of your key tasks will be...‚Ä¢ Develop, execute, deliver, and provide support on a comprehensive cybersecurity and information security strategy that aligns with business objectives,‚Ä¢ Lead, mentor, and oversee a small global team responsible for security operations, incident response, and threat detection, fostering a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence,‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the Group IT team to ensure the organisation is protected against cyber threats and maintain an effective incident response plan,‚Ä¢ Play a pivotal role in ensuring the security of Tunstall‚Äôs SaaS products,‚Ä¢ Identify, review, select, and manage our relationships with appropriate third-party security partners for our products,Key skills and experience:‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Security, or a related field, or equivalent experience,‚Ä¢ Proven experience in cyber security and information security, in a leadership role, ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of SaaS and on-premise technical solutions, ‚Ä¢ Proven experience in delivering security solutions for SaaS products

We are currently looking for a Software Development Manager (cloud micro services, Microsoft technologies, and / or mobile application development) to lead on software development and deployment at Tunstall, making sure quality solutions are delivered and fit for use and purpose. Role is hybrid based from our Madrid office.You must be able to communicate effectively in both Spanish and English for this role.But there‚Äôs more to this than just the ‚Äòday job‚Äô. As a Group we‚Äôre embarking on an exciting period of transformation. We want to fundamentally transform the systems, processes, people, and technology across our business, to achieve measurable and sustainable improvements in our delivery, colleague engagement and stakeholder satisfaction. You‚Äôll play a vital part in contributing to this transformation, helping to shape the software solutions we offer to our users.What will you be doing in this role?In this vital and challenge role, you will build strong working relationships with senior stakeholders and be responsible for the successful development and deployment of quality solutions that are fit for use and purpose.You will lead and coach a team to deliver at all stages of the software development life cycle and make sure teams are adequately resourced and have the correct technical skillsets to deliver success. A key focus for you will be talent attraction and retention, and the building of a high performing team. You will also help to set the policy and drive adherence to standards for development projects and lead on the selection and development of appropriate software design methods, tools, and techniques.Managing and prioritising project deliverables, including managing project costs, and addressing technical challenges by drawing on your own technical domain knowledge and relevant experience will be vital to the success of this role. In addition, you will set performance objectives for the team and monitor progress of projects against agreed quality and performance criteria.The Ideal candidate:To be successful in this role you will have strong interpersonal skills, proven experience of leading globally distributed teams and outsourced partners, an excellent knowledge of software development methodologies and technologies (especially scaled agile, cloud and Microsoft frameworks) and a strong focus on quality and delivery. You will have experience of working with cloud micro services using Microsoft and / or mobile applications.Key skills and experience:- Proven leadership and people management skills,- Knowledge and good understanding of cloud micro services using Microsoft and / or mobile applications,- Clear understanding of the key factors required for delivering software,- Knowledge and experience of the use of DevOps tooling and practices,- Clear understanding and practical experience of implementing modern software development methodologies, ensuring quality engineering, and testing,- Significant experience in delivering software solutions and experience of leading the re-factoring of legacy product set to future ready solutions,- Awareness of the importance of safety critical systems and the implications of delivering such systems,- Knowledge of technical infrastructure (including high availability solution design),- Knowledge of information security requirements and best practice,- You must be able to communicate, both verbally and in writing, in both Spanish and English. If you are not sure if you have the relevant skills or experience, then please apply (only takes a few minutes) and let our team review and come back to you.What we offer:- Hybrid working,- Competitive salary + bonus,- A warm and welcoming team environment,- Development and a chance to build a rewarding career.

We are looking for a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Architect to effectively transform the business requirements into an IT solution design specification, ultimately leading to meeting the customer expectations while assuring solutions are safe, reliable, scalable, and flexible.The Salesforce COE team works across a broad range of solutions spanning applications for internal business productivity to external applications for medical professionals and patients. With endless future opportunities in Digital Health, we are well positioned to build products that improve lives.Your responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Drive Marketing Enablement discussions to create Digital Omnichannel Capabilities (Big picture vision) and perform scoping assessments to determine feasibility of projects and create and lead solution designs for internal customers Participate in requirement gathering in global/regional workshops, peer review and sign off functional specifications and user stories while also ensuring overall user experience is considered when designing and deploying new solutions and services. Ensure that designs adhere to solution architecture design (i.e. high level conceptual design) and are traceable to functional as well as non-functional requirements in functional specification while also ensuring adherence with Security and Compliance policies and procedures within Service Delivery scope. Involved in decision making discussions with internal customer groups and design authority groups. Planning deployments together with Project Managers and Operations Team. Responsible for documentation of deployments, deployments between development environments and validation / productive orgs and end to end testing. Ensure implemented solutions are according to specifications and fit for purpose. Role RequirementsUniversity degree in business/technical area or equivalent with 8+ years of experience in a Solution Design or equivalent role with 3 of those years¬¥ experience in Salesforce Marketing Cloud. Marketing Cloud certifications would be an advantage. Significant experience in a similar role with a proven track record in managing Global and large-scale Marketing Automation projects with strong practical development knowledge of Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Marketing Cloud Integrations, Integration Design, Data Modelling, AMPScript, SQL and Data Mapping. HTML and CSS would be an advantage. Conceptual knowledge of Marketing automation and Campaign Design, Identify resolution, Customer Intent funnel, Programmatic and Predictive Personalization Knowledge of tools which integrate with Marketing cloud such as Interaction Studio, Datorama, Google Analytics, CDP, Salesforce CRM, MDM, Snowflake, etc. Proven track record in large, preferably global, multi-team projects dealing with complex process areas and business groups with experience in a Life Science or highly regulated environment an advantage. Fluent English written and spoken You¬¥ll receive:Breakdown of benefits received in this role.  As a curious organization we provide endless opportunities to learn and grow through remote, online and classroom learning services across a broad range of topics.  You will also be afforded the opportunity to develop your technical skills on the salesforce platform through training and certification as well as our delivery frameworks such as Scrum and SAFe Company Pension Plan. Life and Accidental Insurance. Canteen in the office. Flexible working hours

herramientas: Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services, Linux, Git
descripcion: As a Platform Engineer at our organization, you will play a pivotal role in both our internal and external-facing operations. Your primary responsibilities will include developing and managing our internal platforms, automating processes, and collaborating with various teams to streamline operations.You will also design, integrate, and manage our cloud-based systems to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and scalability. A key aspect of your role will be to integrate security practices into our DevOps processes, embodying the principles of DevSecOps, and ensuring the security and compliance of our cloud infrastructure.You will be instrumental in creating a robust infrastructure that supports our software development lifecycle, from coding and testing to deployment and monitoring. Your expertise will be crucial in enhancing our capabilities, improving system reliability, and driving efficiency across the organization.This role requires a deep understanding of modern software engineering practices, cloud technologies, a strong focus on customer service, and a commitment to maintaining high-quality, reliable systems.Working with us:- 4-day week with 36 working hours after 2 years with the company- Permanent employment contract- Flexible working hours- Work from home or on site in our CIB offices ‚Äì you decide!- Training and perspectives for your professional and personal development- Incentives, social benefits, sports and training- Enjoy workation in Munich, Vienna, Valencia, Canary Islands or LisbonYour tasks:- Continuously improve development, deployment, and operational processes to increase team efficiency and accelerate value creation.- Build and maintain a self-service platform for developer teams to streamline their work and foster  independence. Empower them to easily adopt modern DevOps methodologies and our internal development platform.- Design, implement, and manage our cloud-based systems to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and  scalability.- Work closely with our clients and partners to understand their needs and provide tailored cloud solutions.- Monitor system health, troubleshoot issues, and implement robust disaster recovery plans.- Ensure the security and compliance of our cloud infrastructure, adhering to industry standards and best  practices.- Participate in strategic planning and decision-making to ensure our practices are aligned with the  organization‚Äôs goals and objectives.- Collaborate with other teams and departments to understand their needs and plan for future requirements.- Provision scalable and fail-safe container-based platforms using technologies like Kubernetes on Amazon Web Services.Your profile:- You have the ambition to continuously improve both development, deployment, and operational processes to increase team efficiency and create value faster.- You are eager to participate in building a self-service platform for development teams.- You have knowledge in building scalable and resilient container-based platforms (Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services).- You have a strong understanding of Linux systems and their administration.- You have good knowledge of working with versioning tools such as Git and have proven coding experience in at least one scripting language (e.g. Python).- You have experience with GitOps practices and tooling and understand how to use Git as a single source of truth for declarative infrastructure (Infrastructure as Code, e.g. Terraform) and applications (Helm).- You have hands-on experience with deploying cloud native tools for continuous integration & delivery,  observability and security (e.g. GitLab, Jenkins, Prometheus, Grafana and NeuVector).- You have experience with monitoring systems, troubleshooting and implementing robust disaster recovery plans.- Good German and English skills round off your profile.

Casa Systems, Inc. (Nasdaq: CASA) is 5G, delivering physical, virtual and cloud-native 5G infrastructure and customer premise networking for high-speed data and multi-service communications networks. Our core and edge convergence technology enables public and private networks for both communications service providers and enterprises. Casa Systems‚Ñ¢ products deliver higher performance, improved network flexibility and scalability, increased operational efficiency and lower total cost of ownership (TCO). Commercially deployed in more than 70 countries, Casa serves over 475 Tier 1 and regional service providers worldwide. At Casa Systems, our mission is to deliver ultra-broadband solutions that keep families, communities and the world connected. We harness our passion for innovation to drive technological solutions that allow service providers to do amazing things that improve the way we live.Position Summary:The Software Quality Assurance Engineer impacts the organization by supporting and working with an agile cross-functional team in analyzing, designing, building complete quality assurance framework, including automated and manual test, testing high quality RAN products, impacting the organization by performing the quality assurance mainly with Test Automation Scripts of high performance 4G/5G RAN products. The SQA Engineer will review basic, internal product requirements as well as customer requirements, designing test plans, writing test cases, defining test strategies, and performing specific test plans per customers and exploratory testing for the RAN products. The SQA Engineer will submit and verify defects, maintaining documentation of test results to assist in debugging and modification of RAN products, analyzing test results to certify existing functionality and integrations, recommending corrective action upon failures. Testing will include functional and non-functional, integration, regression, system, and exploratory testing.Key Responsibilities:‚Ä¢ Review product requirements.‚Ä¢ Develop test plans and test cases for manual and automated execution.‚Ä¢ Execute manual tests and create automated test scripts.‚Ä¢ Manage the automated test environment for continuous integration.‚Ä¢ Review tests results, investigate issues, report defects, and validate fixes.‚Ä¢ Provide a global vision of the project identifying potential risks and issues.‚Ä¢ Investigate new test techniques and processes.REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, EDUCATION, & EXPERIENCE:‚Ä¢ Graduate degree in Telecommunications, Computer Science, Electronic Engineering or equivalent.‚Ä¢ 0 ‚Äì 3 years of experience in software or hardware system testing.‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of radio and 4G/5G cellular technologies.‚Ä¢ Experience in test automation using scripting languages such as Python.‚Ä¢ Understanding of TCP/IP networks.‚Ä¢ Good written and verbal communication skills in English.‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ Understanding of LTE architecture and 3GPP standards.‚Ä¢ Understanding of 5G SA and NSA.‚Ä¢ Experience working in an Agile Development environment.‚Ä¢ ISTQB or IREB certification.‚Ä¢ Experience with continuous integration tools such as Jenkins.‚Ä¢ Experience with test frameworks such as Robot Framework or Cucumber.‚Ä¢ Experience with test and issue management software such as Jira, Gitlab or TestLink.‚Ä¢ Familiarity with TDD and ATDD.‚Ä¢ Linux/Unix operating system knowledge and shell scripting.‚Ä¢ Able to live Casa‚Äôs core values: fun work environment, innovation & risk taking; passion, dedication & perseverance; and honesty & loyalty. Casa Systems, Inc. offers a great work environment, professional development, challenging careers, and competitive compensation. Casa Systems is committed to fostering a diverse workforce and inclusive work environment free from unlawful employment discrimination and without barriers to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO).

This includes:100% remote workingEmployees now have the flexibility to choose where they want to work, with remote working available on a part- or full-time basis (not applicable to some Workplace/IT jobs due to nature of role requiring presence onsite, in the office).Learning and developmentAll employees have access to LinkedIn Learning (and Pluralsight for our technology team), an annual personal learning budget, and dedicated L&D time.WellbeingWe offer free online yoga classes, an employee assistance plan, access to the Headspace app, and four wellbeing days on top of your annual leave allowance.Volunteering opportunitiesEmployees can dedicate three days each year to volunteer for a personal cause or through our volunteering partner platform, Alaya.Frontiers actively embraces diversity and is a safe and welcoming workplace. Recruitment is free from discrimination ‚Äì including based on race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or sexual orientation. With over 600 employees from more than 50 different nations, our diversity creates vibrant teams and constantly challenges us to appreciate multiple perspectives.

Who we areFrontiers is an award-winning open science platform and leading open access scholarly publisher.We are one of the largest and most cited publishers globally. To date, our 200,000 freely available research articles have received more than 1 billion views and downloads and 2 million citations. Our journals span science, health, humanities and social sciences, engineering, and sustainability. And we continue to expand into new academic disciplines so more researchers can publish open access.Be part of the publishing revolution and help us transform the way research is published, evaluated, and communicated to the world.Key Responsibilities:- Query existing data sources, and source systems- Design, develop, and maintain data reporting dashboards and data sources in Tableau based on end-user specifications and knowledge of BI best practices- Use SQL to query relational databases, including queries to investigate data, define and create data models for reporting and analyse existing code to identify potential improvements- Analyze complex data to determine correlation and data integrity issues- Understand and apply general BI best practices and guidelines- Work with business users, software, and data engineers, to ensure enterprise BI solutions are reliable, scalable, and flexible- Perform QA of own work and other junior team members- Work independently to solve issues and escalate technical and business issues appropriately- Comfortable working with an Agile methodology, using Kanban boardsBenefits With more than 50 nationalities represented in our global team, you will work regularly with teammates in other countries, and with our community of researchers, editors, and authors from around the globe.Our mission to create solutions for healthy lives also extends to the working environment we provide for our employees. This includes:- 100% remote workingEmployees now have the flexibility to choose where they want to work, with remote working available on a part- or full-time basis (not applicable to some Workplace/IT jobs due to nature of role requiring presence onsite, in the office).- Learning and developmentAll employees have access to LinkedIn Learning (and Pluralsight for our technology team), an annual personal learning budget, and dedicated L&D time.- WellbeingWe offer free online yoga classes, an employee assistance plan, access to the Headspace app, and four wellbeing days on top of your annual leave allowance.- Volunteering opportunitiesEmployees can dedicate three days each year to volunteer for a personal cause or through our volunteering partner platform, Alaya.Frontiers actively embraces diversity and is a safe and welcoming workplace. Recruitment is free from discrimination ‚Äì including based on race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or sexual orientation. With over 600 employees from more than 50 different nations, our diversity creates vibrant teams and constantly challenges us to appreciate multiple perspectives.
